biotools.summary: The model performs a classification of the patient using lung CT images. The classification is based on the National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) guidelines and provide a binary classification of the cancer stage, in class ‘0’ that includes patients with overall stage stage I and II and class ‘1’ that includes patients with overall stage III and IV4 (i.e. more severe, with different treatment).

bioschemas.name: Radiomics based Lung cancer staging
bioschemas.summary: The model performs a classification of the patient using lung CT images. The classification is based on the National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) guidelines and provide a binary classification of the cancer stage, in class ‘0’ that includes patients with overall stage stage I and II and class ‘1’ that includes patients with overall stage III and IV4 (i.e. more severe, with different treatment).
